css: .cover-immobilieninvestition-section { padding: 6rem 0; text-align: center; background-color: #f3f4f6; } .cover-immobilieninvestition-section .container { max-width: 900px; margin: 0 auto; } .cover-immobilieninvestition-section h1 { font-size: 3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .cover-immobilieninvestition-section p { font-size: 1.1rem; color: var(--color-secondary); margin-bottom: 3rem; } .cover-immobilieninvestition-section img { width: 100%; border-radius: 1rem; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); }

de.name: Immobilieninvestition
de.title: Investieren Sie in Ihre Zukunft
de.subtitle: Entdecken Sie erstklassige Immobilienmöglichkeiten mit hohem Renditepotenzial.

en.name: Real Estate Investment
en.title: Invest in Your Future
en.subtitle: Discover premium real estate opportunities with high return potential.
